exchange.question: I'm sorry. I had the lamp, and then lost it.
exchange.answer: If only my dear friend the vizier were here. He would know what to do.

exchange.question: I met him in the thieves' lair! He helped me find the lamp.
exchange.answer: He is wise and brave! Tell me, is there news of him?

exchange.question: Umï¿½ y'know, last I saw of him he just kind of disappeared into thin air.

character.statement: I must find that genie. You may stay in the palace if you wish, but don't go poking around in here.
